question: Which country is hosting the 21st World Congress of Mental Health (WCMH) 2017?
explanation: The 21st World Congress of Mental Health has started in New Delhi with theme \"Partnerships for Mental Health\" on November 2, 2017, which is organised by the World Federation for Mental Health in partnership with Caring Foundation and other institutions. It was inaugurated by the President of India, Ram Nath Kovind. The 4-day WFMH World Congress is hosted in the SAARC region for the first time and will witness participation of over 1000 delegates from across the world. It will have sessions on yoga, meditation and traditional approaches to mental health.
